titleStmt.title: The regenerate mans growth in grace. Shewing, that regeneration of necessitie requireth augmentation in grace. With the motives to move us to grow, signes to know whether we have grown; the lets that hinder our growth; and helps to further our growth. / Preached at a sermon at Lancaster, upon a day of humiliation, by N.B. minister thereof.
titleStmt.author: Barnett, Nehemiah, b. 1614 or 15.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Dawson for John Williams,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
